header.description: I am a fullstack software developer graduated from 4Geeks Academy, working mainly with ReactJS and Python y NodeJS, after years of professional experience in graphic design. I consider that I am self-critical when evaluating my work and that teamwork provides more value than individual work. I am looking for a stable work environment that allows me to add value and continue learning.
header.contact1: Do you want to know something more
header.traveland: E-commerce developed in React using libraries such as Redux for managing global states and axios for HTTP requests, storing the data in MongoDB.
header.rell: World Home is a web application for real estate developed in React. For routing implement React Router v6 and hooks like useState, useEffect, useContext in the component lifecycle.
header.todo: Traveland is a web application to connect people through the creation of travel routes in which they can travel together.
